signature_info.Status: signed by a developer certificate issued by Apple for distribution
signature_info.signers: RealVNC Limited; Apple Inc.; Apple Inc.

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Execution of Suspicious File Type Extension

values.CommandLine: /usr/bin/syslog -s -k com.apple.message.domain com.apple.security.assessment.current_state com.apple.message.signature assessments enabled com.apple.message.signature2 devid enabled Message Gatekeeper state assessments enabled/devid enabled

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event doesn't refer to an .exe file (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)

sigma_analysis_results.rule_title: Potentially Suspicious Execution From Tmp Folder
sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Detects a potentially suspicious execution of a process located in the '/tmp/' folder

values.CommandLine: /usr/bin/syslog -s -k com.apple.message.domain com.apple.security.assessment.current_state com.apple.message.signature assessments enabled com.apple.message.signature2 devid enabled Message Gatekeeper state assessments enabled/devid enabled

sigma_analysis_results.rule_description: Checks whether the image specified in a process creation event is not a full, absolute path (caused by process ghosting or other unorthodox methods to start a process)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: (stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset received
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert ( gid:129; sid:18; rev:2; msg:"(stream_tcp) data sent on stream after TCP reset received"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type preproc; classtype:bad-unknown;)
alert ( gid:116; sid:58; rev:2; msg:"(tcp) experimental TCP options found"; metadata: policy max-detect-ips drop, rule-type decode; classtype:protocol-command-decode;)

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: SURICATA STREAM Packet with invalid timestamp
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert tcp any any -> any any (msg:"SURICATA STREAM Packet with invalid timestamp"; stream-event:pkt_invalid_timestamp; classtype:protocol-command-decode; sid:2210044; rev:2;)

attributes.magic: xar archive compressed TOC: 4751, SHA-1 checksum
